products.name: Solar Panel
products.description: A solar panel is a device that converts sunlight into electricity.

products.name: Smart Thermostat
products.description: A smart thermostat is a device that allows you to control the temperature of your home or office.

products.name: Smart Lock
products.description: A smart lock is a device that allows you to lock and unlock your door. It is a key component of a smart home system.

products.name: Smart Plug
products.description: A smart plug is a device that allows you to plug in your devices and control them from anywhere.

products.name: Home Energy Monitor
products.description: Track your home's energy usage in real-time and identify which appliances are costing you the most.

products.name: EV Charger
products.description: An EV charger is a device that allows you to charge your electric vehicle. It is a key component of a smart home system.

products.name: Energy Efficient Shower Head
products.description: Reduce water usage by up to 40% while maintaining strong water pressure for a satisfying shower experience.

products.name: Smart Light Switch
products.description: Control your lights from anywhere and set schedules to ensure you never waste electricity on empty rooms.

products.name: Portable Wind Turbine
products.description: Generate clean energy outdoors with this compact wind turbine perfect for camping and off-grid adventures.

products.name: Energy Saving Refrigerator Thermometer
products.description: Optimize your refrigerator temperature to reduce energy consumption while keeping food fresh.

products.name: Weatherproofing Door and Window Kit
products.description: Stop drafts and reduce heating costs with this complete kit for sealing doors and windows.

products.name: USB Rechargeable Batteries (Pack of 8)
products.description: Eliminate disposable battery waste with these USB rechargeable batteries that can be reused up to 1000 times.
